1.productDescription: Add a splash of vibrant style to your ethnic wardrobe with this Women’s Printed Pure Cotton Straight Kurta by PRISCA. Crafted from soft, breathable pure cotton fabric, this maroon kurta features beautiful traditional prints that highlight its ethnic charm. The straight cut offers a flattering fit suitable for all body types, while ensuring comfort during warm weather. Perfect for daily wear, office meetings, or casual gatherings, this kurta can be paired effortlessly with jeans, leggings, or palazzos. Its easy-care material and versatile design make it a go-to choice for those who want to stay stylish without compromising comfort.
